narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
 
This is a focused inspection on the direct non-compliant item regarding the male, Red Kangaroo cited under 2.40
(b) (2) on the inspection report dated January 21, 2015.  This kangaroo has been evaluated by a licensed
veterinarian and diagnosis and treatment plan are under development.
Exit interview conducted with facility representative.
